summary: Four self-centered people spend midsummers eve in a campsite. Concentrating on their own bloated egos, they are unaware that the world is, in fact, ending.
cast: Kjersti Holmen|Ingar Helge Gimle|Ane Dahl Torp|Jon Øigarden|Ghita Nørby|Oscar Lunde|Ingvar Grimberg|Hjördis Kjällman|Inge Linder|Johanna Halle|Nina Eriksson|Marianne Mørk Larsen|Assad Siddique|Dennis Storhøi|Jonas Lundgren|Lovisa Håkansdotter Wallin
title: Mennesker i solen
